time.description: Time in ms to aspirate or dispense / keep vacuum or pressure open

pick.description: The pipette height to pick, in mm

clearance.description: The pipette height to clear the destination plate, in mm

dispense.description: The pipette height to dispense, in mm

pipette_swing.description: The height to move pipette in order to rotate it in/out from the microscope, in mm

stage.description: The stage positions to image with fluorescence, in mm

TL_corner.description: The stage positions of well A01, in um

BR_corner.description: The stage positions of the highest well, in um
